CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper March 28, 1953, pg. 13, reads: "Training to be Lifeguards - The threatened shortage of male lifeguards in city and county pools this year has brought out a crop of female swimming experts who think that they can do the job as well if not better than the men... In the right hand photo, while Don Mator, Jimmy Barker and Richard McDaniel, instructor, look on, Gailya Hord demonstrates at life-saving technique on Shirley Thomas... - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Don Mator, Jimmy Barker and Richard McDaniel observing Gailya Hord demonstrating lifesaving maneuver on Shirley Thomas during lifeguard training in indoor swimming pool at East Liberty YMCA
